titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I finished a short address for the soldiers, & delivered it at the Military Service. Also I attended Mattins, and celebrated the Holy Communion afterwards. After lunch I shewed
over the house & the Cathedral. Then I attended Evensong, & afterwards took James & Kathleen for a walk. I wrote to Lady Londonderry. Colonel Grimshaw came to dinner.
